amendment.description: To make certain forestry workers eligible for legal assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3209 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S12913-12914; text: CR S12913) To make certain forestry workers eligible for legal assistance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3209 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Bingaman.
